title: I went negative ip!!??
body: I bought Wukong  for 4800 ip with 6046 ip which leaves me with 1246 ip, but it says i have -3554 ip. Why Rito why?

replies.body: you bought wukong twice. now, whenever you choose wukong, you spawn with two champions
That's Wukong and The Devil Lord?{{champion:17}}
It's just a visual bug. Log off the client and log back in and it should be fine
Yup, it's a visual issue, most likely. D:
